info.title: Video Management
info.description:
Use the Video Management API to manage channels, channel permissions, playlists, and videos.

 You can create, delete, update, and list the available channels and playlists. You can add and remove videos from channels and playlists or list the videos in a channel or playlist.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of channels.

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:read`,`video_mgmt_channels:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_channels`,`video_mgmt:read:list_channels:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a set of large results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the channel owner. It is used for an account-level [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/). Providing this parameter will return only the channels owned by the specified user. Omit this field for user-level apps.

description.example: A cinematic journey through the world of cuisine!.

owner_id.description: The ID of the channel owner.

status.description:
The channel status.
 * `PUBLISH` - A published channel.
 * `DRAFT` - A draft channel.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Creates a channel for managing videos. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:write:channel`,`video_mgmt:write:channel:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the on-behalf-of user who has the permission to create a channel. It's used for an account-level [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/). For user-level apps, this should not be used.

description.example: A cinematic journey through the world of cuisine!

categories.description: The category of the channel. Use categories to classify your videos and help viewers filter videos.

description.example: A cinematic journey through th world of cuisine!

status.description:
The video channel status: 
 * `PUBLISHED` - A published channel.
 * `DRAFT` - A draft channel.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Returns the details of the video channel.

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:read`,`video_mgmt_channels:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:channel`,`video_mgmt:read:channel:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID.

description.example: A cinematic journey through the world of cuisine!.

owner_id.description: The ID of the channel owner.

status.description:
The channel status. 
 * `PUBLISH` - Published channel.
 * `DRAFT` - Draft channel.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30661005`
Channel not found.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

delete.description:
Deletes a video channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A Pro or higher account plan.
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:delete:channel`,`video_mgmt:delete:channel:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

categories.description: The category of the channel. Categories allow you to classify your videos and help viewers filter videos.

patch.description:
Perform state transition actions on a video channel . 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:update:channel`,`video_mgmt:update:channel:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The video channel ID.

operation.description:
The available actions for a video channel. 
* `publish` — Publish the channel.  
* `unpublish` — Un-publish the published channel.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`  
 
 Channel status changed successfully.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30661005`
Channel not found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Retrieves the list of permissions for a channel. \n
**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:read`,`video_mgmt_channels:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_permissions`,`video_mgmt:read:list_permissions:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a set of large results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

role.description:
The channel user's role: 
 * `OWNER` = The channel owner
 * `COLLABORATOR` = Channel user with collaborator permissions 
 * `VIEWER` = Channel user with view permissions

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30661005`
Channel not found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Creates permissions for the given channel ID. Add users, such as collaborators or viewers, to the channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:write:permissions`,`video_mgmt:write:permissions:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID

permissions.description: The list of channel permissions to be added.

role.description:
The channel user's role: 
 * `COLLABORATOR` = A channel user with collaborator permissions 
 * `VIEWER` = A channel user with view permissions

**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `30661001`

get.description:
Retrieves the list of playlists for the channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:read`,`video_mgmt_channels:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_channel_playlists`,`video_mgmt:read:list_channel_playlists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a set of large results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call. Max 300.

200.description: List of playlists for the channel

playlists.description: List of playlists for the channel.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

delete.description:
Removes playlists from the channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:delete:channel_playlists`,`video_mgmt:delete:channel_playlists:admin`

parameters.description: The channel ID

**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Retrieves the list of playlists for the user. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_playlists:read`,`video_mgmt_playlists:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_playlists`,`video_mgmt:read:list_playlists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a set of large results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the playlist owner. It is used for an account-level [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/). Providing this parameter will return only the playlists owned by the specified user. Omit this for user-level apps.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The text to search for playlists by name. A minimum of 3 characters is needed to search. Search is not case-sensitive.

200.description: List of playlists for the user

playlists.description: List of playlists for the user.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Creates a playlist for managing videos. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_playlists:write`,`video_mgmt_playlists:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:write:playlist`,`video_mgmt:write:playlist:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the on-behalf-of user who has the permission to create playlist. It is used for an account-level [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/). Omit this field for user-level apps.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

parameters.name: playlistId

Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`

get.description:
Gets a list of the channel's videos. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:read`,`video_mgmt_channels:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_channel_videos`,`video_mgmt:read:list_channel_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The video channel ID.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use this token to fetch the next page of results. Returns a `next_page_token` when the total number of results exceeds the current page size. Include this token in your next request to continue pagination. The token expires after 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

next_page_token.description: Token to access the next page of results.

play_link.description: A link to play the video.

duration.description: The duration of the video in milliseconds.

video_status.description:
The status of the video: 
 * `PROCESSING` = The video is currently being processed. 
 * `COMPLETED` = The video has been processed successfully.

video_source.description:
The business domain or source of the video : 
 * `ZOOM RECORDING` = The video is from Zoom recording. 
 * `CLIPS` = The video is from Zoom clips.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Adds videos to the channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:write:channel_videos`,`video_mgmt:write:channel_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID.

videos.description: The list of videos to add to the channel.

meeting_id.description: Zoom meeting ID. Add recording from a specific meeting.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30661005`
Channel not found.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

delete.description:
Removes videos from the channel. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_channels:write`,`video_mgmt_channels:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:delete:channel_videos`,`video_mgmt:delete:channel_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel ID

videos.description: The list of videos to remove from the channel.

meeting_id.description: Zoom meeting ID. Remove the recording of a specific meeting.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30661005`
Channel not found.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Gets the playlist's list of videos. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_playlists:read`,`video_mgmt_playlists:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_playlist_videos`,`video_mgmt:read:list_playlist_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The playlist ID.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Returned when the total results exceed the current page size. Include this token in your next request to fetch the next page of results. The token expires after 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

next_page_token.description: The token to return the next page of results.

play_link.description: The URL to play the video.

video_status.description:
The video status: 
 * `PROCESSING` = Video is currently being processed. 
 * `COMPLETED` = Video processing has finished successfully.

video_source.description:
The business domain or source of the video : 
 * `ZOOM RECORDING` = The video is from Zoom recording. 
 * `CLIPS` = The video is from Zoom clips.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Adds videos to a playlist. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_playlists:write`,`video_mgmt_playlists:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:write:playlist_videos`,`video_mgmt:write:playlist_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The playlist ID.

videos.description: The list of videos to add to the playlist.

meeting_id.description: Zoom meeting ID. Use this to add the recording from a specific meeting.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

delete.description:
Deletes videos from a playlist. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_playlists:write`,`video_mgmt_playlists:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:delete:playlist_videos`,`video_mgmt:delete:playlist_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The playlist ID.

videos.description: The list of videos to remove from the playlist.

meeting_id.description: Zoom meeting ID. Remove the recording from a specific meeting.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Retrieves the list of videos or recordings added by the user. 

**Prerequisites**:
* A [Pro or higher account plan](https://www.zoom.us/pricing?).
* A Zoom Video Management license.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt_videos:read`,`video_mgmt_videos:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `video_mgmt:read:list_videos`,`video_mgmt:read:list_videos:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The text to use for search. A minimum of 3 characters is needed to search.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a set of large results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the owner. It is used for an account-level [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/). Providing this parameter will return only the videos owned by the specified user. Omit this for user-level apps.

200.description: List of videos for the user

duration.description: The duration of the video in milliseconds.

video_status.description:
The status of the video: 
 * `PROCESSING` = The video is currently being processed. 
 * `COMPLETED` = The video has been processed successfully.

video_source.description:
The business domain or source of the video : 
 * `ZOOM RECORDING` = The video is from Zoom recording. 
 * `CLIPS` = The video is from Zoom clips.

owner_name.description: The name of the owner of the video.

owner_email.description: The email address of the owner of the video

created_time.description: The time the video was created in UTC format. The format will be `yyyy-MM-dd`T`HH:mm:ssZ`

modified_time.description: The time the video was modified in UTC format. The format will be `yyyy-MM-dd`T`HH:mm:ssZ`

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).
